comment: Find a good group for this class or it will be torture! The coursework itself isn't too hard, but the final project was 100 survey responses + you had to analyze it and write a paper. I had awful groupmates, but thankfully the professor was serious about participation and I still got a good grade for my portion. Lectures + notes are very helpful!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Group projects

comment: He may move a bit fast during his lectures, but he is very knowledgeable and is there to help you if you don't understand something. Attendance is mandatory. Overall, Dr. Fennell is very caring and wants you to succeed.
Do not make the mistake I made and take this professor!!

He's a kindhearted caring guy that talks to his students like they are normal people. Very intelligent, willing to help kindly. Tests are kind of tough, probably need study guides is only complaint. One semester-long group project, one group paper. Takes time to learn about all of his students.
